summary: Space hero Captain Video battles the evil Vultura on the planet Atoma.
cast: Judd Holdren|Larry Stewart|George Eldredge|Gene Roth|Don C. Harvey|William Fawcett|Jack Ingram|I. title: Captain Video: Master of the Stratosphere
